doc.field: Letters: "Report on Three Spanish Organizations," Moe Fishman to VALB; JB correspondence with: Alvah Bessie (1980); Ruth M. Decker (1973); Milt Felsen; Carl Geiser (1988); Boris Smirnov (1976?); A. L. Tanz (1986) Periodical: Volunteer for Liberty(Nov 1946) Flyer and speech re: Memorial meeting honoring City College students, alumni and teachers who volunteered in the Spanish Civil War, Apr 13, 1980 Clippings re: Chinese volunteers; Ralph Fasanella; Raleigh Frohman; Ben Goldring; George Kaye; Clement Markert; Saul Wellman
